snippet.title: SkyRider The Game - Official Trailer 2016
snippet.description:
A 2 Player co-op action puzzle platformer game. One player will control Noki, jumping, fighting and collecting energy for his drone. The other one will control that drone: "R.O.B.O.T.O", making platforms, energy shields and shooting. 

Coming Soon for PC - Mac - Linux.

Website: http://skyriderthegame.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SkyRiderTheGame
Twitter: http://twiter.com/skyriderthegame
Devlog: http://skyriderthegame.tumblr.com/
